title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1902/89 of 29 June 1989 derogating in respect of the opening weeks of the 1989/90 marketing year from the quality standards applicable to certain varieties of apples and pears
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1902/89
of 29 June 1989
derogating in respect of the opening weeks of the 1989/90 marketing year from the quality standards applicable to certain varieties of apples and pears
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 June 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
